name: The Transformer
description: I started this one in 1996 but I lost interest and never finished it. After rediscovering it I finally decided to complete it. This is an update to last week's release which contained a texture bug and was incompatible with the latest ZDoom versions. This version has been checked with ZDoom 2.0.47, Legacy 1.4, PrBoom 2.2.3 and the original Doom2.exe.
